alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 22 at 2:55PM EDT until September 23 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Up to 1 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk County. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline, due to elevated water levels and 3 to 6 ft breaking surf. Breaking waves will also result in beach erosion and flooding, particularly at Orient Point.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
